item.description:
From the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum:

For our December 20th Gardner After Hours, we’re partnering with Grub Street, an independent center for creative writing, for an evening of words, poetry, and literature. Few people realize that Isabella Gardner’s collecting career began with an interest in manuscripts and rare books, and that she was an avid supporter of writers in her lifetime. Join us for a book-making project in the studio, a twist on Mad Libs, flash poetry, performances by the Boston Typewriter Orchestra, and more!  – here is the link: 

http://www.gardnermuseum.org/calendar/events/4734

Tickets can be obtained here:

https://tickets.gardnermuseum.org/public/daily_events_list.asp

Word Play starts at 7:00pm. I put the start time as 6:30(I'll try to be at the ticket taking area), so we can wander around the Museum for abit before Word Play starts. Feel free to arrive when you can. After Hours actually starts at 5:00. I'll try to arrive a short time after that. Lol, I see that there is at least one other meetup group there that night.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a meetup button/will give out Cell Phone # the night before.
item.name: Gardner After Hours 12/20 6:30
